name: Moonglow Firefly
description:
A strange but commonly seen life form in Nod-Krai, covered from head to tail in thick white fluff. They say that its lightly trembling feelers can sense the moonlight's flow.
For some reason, capturing it can allow you to obtain Crystal Cores that you would usually get from Crystalflies. Perhaps this has something to do with why there are no Crystalflies in Nod-Krai...
